meanings.sent1: Seawater is salty and comes from the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The sailors drank seawater when their fresh water ran out.
meanings.sent3: The fish in the aquarium dreamt of being as vast as the seawater.
meanings.sent4: Her tears flowed like endless streams of seawater.
meanings.sent5: The crashing waves carried the essence of seawater into the air.

meanings.definition: The salty water of the sea.
meanings.sent1: Seawater is essential for marine life to thrive.
meanings.sent2: The children collected shells washed up by the seawater.
meanings.sent3: The seagulls danced joyfully in the mist of the seawater.
meanings.sent4: His words stung like the bitterness of seawater.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the horizon with hues reflected in the seawater.
